So it's been months since this blog has been updated. For several months it was shutdown. I was worried at one point that I had lost the art from the posts but I had backed it up on a Digital Ocean server. Since then the art has been restored but it's not linking correctly on artcontrol.me

I have decided to switch from the wp-contents folder structure to the galleries system that is default in Nikola.
